mapper.select: SELECT A.ORD_NO, A.MTR_CD, FN_GET_MTR_CD_TO_NM(A.MTR_CD) AS MTR_NM, A.UNIT, A.UNIT_COST, A.ORD_AMT, A.IN_AMT, A.NOTIN_AMT, A.FLT_AMT, TO_CHAR(B.ORD_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS ORD_DATE, FN_GET_BAS_DTL_CD_TO_NM(B.COMP_CD) AS COMP_NM, A.CMT, C.MNG_AMT FROM MTR_ORD_DTL A, MTR_ORD B, ADM_MTR C WHERE A.ORD_NO = B.ORD_NO AND A.MTR_CD = C.MTR_CD AND A.NOTIN_AMT > 0
